name: Cerberus
flavor_text: Always vigilant. Always fierce. Always fighting for the ball.
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 "ink" to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.) 

Challenger +3 When challenging, this character get +3 {s}.) 

Stolen Dust - Characters with cost 3 or less can't challenge this character.
